منكر munkar denied; not recognized, unacknowledged, disowned, disavowed, disclaimed; disagreeable, shocking, detestable, abominable; abomination, atrocity; pl. منكرات objectionable, forbidden, 998 or reprehensible, actions │ منكر ونكير the two angels who examine the dead in their graves as to their faith
